meanings.definition: A person who hits the baseball with great force.
meanings.sent1: The sluggers on the team always hit the ball really hard.
meanings.sent2: The coach was proud of the team's sluggers for their powerful hits.
meanings.sent3: The sluggers at the game made the baseball look like it was flying!
meanings.sent4: Watching the sluggers play was like witnessing a thunderstorm of hits.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the sluggers' bats echoed through the stadium.

meanings.definition: A group of baseball players known for their powerful hitting abilities.
meanings.sent1: The team's sluggers practiced their hitting skills every day.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered loudly for the sluggers when they stepped up to bat.
meanings.sent3: The sluggers joked that they could hit the ball to the moon and back.
meanings.sent4: The sluggers' hits were like cannonballs launching into the outfield.
meanings.sent5: The sluggers' batting prowess was unmatched in the league.
